title: More educated people tend to be more liberal.
body:
But less educated people are not more conservative. Less educated people are more in the center. 

http://www.people-press.org/2016/04/26/a-wider-ideological-gap-between-more-and-less-educated-adults/

Also interesting is that over time people as a whole have become more partisan. The amount of people with mix ideological views has been shrinking over time.

I AM EXPLICITLY STATING THAT CONSERVATIVES ARE NOT DUMBER THAN THE AVERAGE PERSON. I AM EXPLICITLY STATING THIS BECAUSE I THINK THE WARDENS ARE DUMBER THAN THE AVERAGE PERSON.

EDUCATION AND INTELLIGENCE ARE DIFFERENT THINGS AND THEIR RELATIONSHIP IS A DIFFERENT  ISSUE.

So any ideas as to why this is the case? I think it's probably because higher education draws diverse people and exposure to diversity leans people into more liberal mindsets.
